steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
In the print settings, choose the printer you want to use.
Click on the 'Properties' or 'Printer Properties' button.
Navigate to the 'Color' or 'Color Options' section.
Select the 'Black and White' or 'Grayscale' option.
Adjust any other print settings as needed.
Click on the 'Print' button to start printing the document in black and white.
